name: A. Team
statement:
One day three best friends Petya, Vasya and Tonya decided to form a team
and take part in programming contests. Participants are usually offered
several problems during programming contests. Long before the start the
friends decided that they will implement a problem if at least two of
them are sure about the solution. Otherwise, the friends won’t write the
problem’s solution.This contest offers problems to the participants. For
each problem we know, which friend is sure about the solution. Help the
friends find the number of problems for which they will write a
solution.
